jungle_forest_destinations.name: Sundarbans Mangrove Forest
jungle_forest_destinations.short_description: The Sundarbans is the largest mangrove forest in the world, home to the famous Bengal tiger and diverse wildlife.

jungle_forest_destinations.name: Lawachara National Park
jungle_forest_destinations.short_description: Lawachara is a tropical rainforest in Sylhet, famous for its rare primates like the hoolock gibbons.

jungle_forest_destinations.name: Sita Kunda
jungle_forest_destinations.short_description: A serene forest area with a natural pond, located in the Chittagong Hill Tracts.

jungle_forest_destinations.name: Ruma Forest
jungle_forest_destinations.short_description: Dense hilly forest in Bandarban, perfect for trekking and bird watching.

jungle_forest_destinations.name: Chimbuk Hill Forest
jungle_forest_destinations.short_description: Forest on one of Bangladesh's highest peaks, offering rich biodiversity and scenic views.

jungle_forest_destinations.name: Keokradong
jungle_forest_destinations.short_description: Keokradong is one of the highest peaks in Bangladesh, popular among trekkers for its adventurous trails and stunning scenery.

jungle_forest_destinations.name: Tazing Dong
jungle_forest_destinations.short_description: Believed to be the highest peak in Bangladesh, Tazing Dong is a remote hilltop perfect for adventure seekers and nature lovers.

jungle_forest_destinations.name: Nafakhum Waterfall Hills
jungle_forest_destinations.short_description: Located deep in Bandarban, the hills around Nafakhum Waterfall provide a thrilling trek with scenic rivers and forested peaks.

jungle_forest_destinations.name: Debotakhum
jungle_forest_destinations.short_description: Debotakhum is a hidden gem surrounded by towering hills and mysterious waterways, ideal for kayaking and exploration.

jungle_forest_destinations.name: Jaflong Hills
jungle_forest_destinations.short_description: Jaflong, near the Meghalaya border, is a scenic hill station famous for its rolling hills, stone collections, and tea gardens.
